snippet: Over the years, Ni Yulan has been jailed for a long string of charges; the current ones include “picking quarrels.”
abstract: Predicament of Chinese human rights activist Ni Yulan, already crippled from a police beating and imprisoned, will likely worsen as a Beijing court is expected to pass harsh sentences on Ni and husband Dong Jiqin on charges that include 'picking quarrels.'
lead_paragraph: Over the years, Ni Yulan has been jailed for a long string of charges; the current ones include “picking quarrels.”

headline.seo: China Set to Punish Another Human Rights Activist
headline.main: China Set to Punish Another Human Rights Activist
headline.print_headline: China Set to Punish Another Human Rights Activist

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
